name: Flock Fusion
description:
Description

Grow your flock by taking over other flocks, but be careful, if you lose your leader to another flock it's game over.

Hint: More dense flocks will win even against larger flocks.

Inspired by the likes of snake.io and Galcon

Controls

WASD: Turn and speed up/down
Escape or Backspace: Show pause menu
Scroll wheel: Zoom in/out

Gamepad Left stick: Turn speed up/down
Gamepad Start: Show pause menu
Gamepad Dpad up/down: Zoom in/out

Known issues:
  • If you are captured and there are more than two remaining colors you will still be watching the game, until there is only one left. Press escape to open the menu to restart early.
  • Navigating the dropdowns in the custom game menu with a controller is wonky at best. It doesn't close the dropdown when you select something and it doesn't scroll the dropdown. 

You can find the source code here: https://github.com/paul-hansen/bevy-jam-2
